keywordspec.name: SoapUILibrary
keywordspec.doc: The main class of the library

kw.name: Soapui Add Project Property
kw.doc: Adds a project property to properties dictionary. This assumes that you have already initialized the project via the `SoapUI Project` keyword.

kw.name: Soapui Customize Project
kw.doc: Sets the most commonly used values to the project and suite given as parameters

kw.name: Soapui Project
kw.doc: Initialize the runner and set the project string

kw.name: Soapui Run
kw.doc: Run the runner and report to Robot

kw.name: Soapui Set Print Report
kw.doc: Set whether a short report should be reported after the execution of each test case Return type is Python Boolean (True/False)

kw.name: Soapui Set Project Property
kw.doc:
Sets project properties for the current test run. This assumes that you have already initialized the project via the `SoapUI Project` keyword.
`properites` may contain multiple statements, and each must be specified as: key=value.
This is useful to data drive your existing SoapUI tests via property expansion. For more information see: http://www.soapui.org/Scripting-Properties/property-expansion.html
Example: | SoapUI Project | My Project | | SoapUI Set Project Property | ServiceEndpoint=https://staging.company.com | # set a single property | | SoapUI Set Project Property | CustomProperty=foo | AnotherProperty=bar | # or set multiple properties |
